message: Let's get this started! Take 2k, I'll take 8k. You can't lose, right?
Meet me in the middle, let's start with an equal split!
You're being too cautious, Bob! I'll give you 4k, I'll take 6k. Take it or leave it!
You're being generous, but I'm not sure if I'm getting the better deal. I'll take 6k, you can have 4k.
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you 3k, I'll take 7k. Don't make me go any lower!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just being strategic. I'll take 7k, you can have 3k.
I'm going back to my original plan! Take 2k, I'll take 8k. Don't make me regret this!
I'm not falling for the déjà vu. I'll take 9k, you can have 1k. Don't try to trick me again!
I'm running out of options! Take 1k, I'll take 9k. Please, just accept!
I'm not going to take the bait. I'll take 9.5k, you can have 0.5k. It's getting late in the game.
I'm going all-in! Take nothing, I'll take everything. It's the only way I'll survive this inflation!
It's down to the wire. I'll take almost everything, you can have 1$. It's the only way I'll survive this game!
